ldap.title: LDAP Configuration
ldap.description: Configure LDAP/Active Directory to enable enterprise unified authentication

ssh.title: Global SSH Credentials
ssh.description: After configuring global SSH credentials, clicking 'Connect' in Node terminal will automatically use these credentials
ssh.securityTipDesc: SSH credentials are encrypted in the database. SSH key authentication is recommended for better security.
ssh.enableGlobalSshTooltip: When enabled, Node SSH terminal will automatically use these credentials to connect
ssh.keepOriginalPassword: Leave empty to keep current password
ssh.passwordConfiguredPlaceholder: Password configured, leave empty to keep, enter new value to override
ssh.keepOriginalKey: Leave empty to keep current key
ssh.privateKeyConfiguredPlaceholder: Private key configured, leave empty to keep, enter new value to override
ssh.privateKeyPlaceholder:
Paste private key content (PEM format), e.g.:
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----

grafana.title: Grafana Configuration
grafana.description: Configure Grafana connection settings. Supports external Grafana instances.
grafana.tipDesc: Provide the Grafana access URL and API Key (Service Account Token). The API Key requires Admin permissions for automatic Prometheus datasource and dashboard synchronization. The Grafana URL must be accessible from the user's browser.
grafana.allowEmbeddingTip: Ensure Grafana has iframe embedding enabled: set environment variable GF_SECURITY_ALLOW_EMBEDDING=true, or set [security] allow_embedding = true in grafana.ini.
grafana.urlTooltip: Full Grafana access URL including protocol and port
grafana.apiKeyTooltip: Grafana Service Account Token or API Key with Admin permissions
grafana.apiKeyConfiguredPlaceholder: API Key configured, leave empty to keep, enter new value to override
grafana.dashboardSyncDesc: Sync KubePolaris built-in monitoring dashboards to Grafana, including cluster overview, workload detail, and pod detail panels
grafana.syncDashboardsPartial: Some dashboards failed to sync, please check Grafana connection and permissions
grafana.dashboardStatusUnavailable: Please configure and save Grafana connection first to view dashboard status
grafana.dataSourceSyncDesc: Sync Prometheus datasources of monitored clusters to Grafana. Dashboards require corresponding datasources to display data.
grafana.noMonitoringClusters: No clusters with monitoring configured. Please configure Prometheus monitoring URL in cluster management first.
grafana.syncDataSourcesPartial: Some datasources failed to sync, please check Grafana connection and permissions
